original_text: The keeper of the prison looked not to any thing that was under his hand; because the Lord was with him, and that which he did, the Lord made it to prosper.
korean_text: 간수장은 그의 손에 맡긴 것을 무엇이든지 살펴보지 아니하였으니 이는 여호와께서 요셉과 함께 하심이라 여호와께서 그를 범사에 형통하게 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: The keeper of the prison looked not to any thing
because the Lord was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 그와 함께 계셨기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: the Lord made it to prosper
